title: DEG
talk-name: MVC and Webforms: Armed and Ready
talk-description: A new project has come your way and you are faced with a decision: ASP.NET MVC or Web Forms? In this session, You will learn the information needed to properly make a choice. We will discuss the benefits and drawbacks of each approach, what to consider, and the undisputable facts that go along with each. Whether you are an architect or a developer, you will leave armed and ready to make an informed decision.

details-speaker.speaker-bio: Jeffrey Rondeau is a KU Alum with a degree in Computer Science currently working as a .NET Engineer for DEG.  He has a passion for writing clean and efficient code.  Outside of work you can find him playing basketball and trying to help others get involved with the developer community.
